trans:
I'm still longing, but why [D7] can't I see [G] you
2. Water ferns [G] drift, clouds [Bm] float, to distant lands
Oh my [Em] love, I still [C] wait for the drifting [G] water ferns, the floating i i i clouds
Birds [Em] descend, tang ting [G] ting fish [D7] swims
[Em] Holding onto one [G] hope, [Em] two [G] hopes
Three, four longing [D7], but why can't I see [G] you?
Day [G] by day, gaze [Bm] into the distance
Oh my [Em] love, I'm still [C] waiting [G] tirelessly
[G] Gazing at the faraway stars but tang ting ting
Flowers [D7] wither, and my faraway love,, do you [G] remember
Remember the one [Em] sitting here, waiting for the birds [G] in the sky
Why [D7] can't I see [G] you
This is a Northern folk song! This song is good and easy to learn. If you want to learn, I will teach you!
